pr_title: Add and fix more null annotations

timeline.bodyText: There are some deprecated constructors (see above) passing null values.
timeline.author: wborn

replies.bodyText: We should get rid of them in a follow-up PR.
replies.author: cweitkamp

timeline.bodyText: The compiler failed without explicitly casting localizedObject. If it's not assigned here and casted as parameter on the line below, the cast would be removed by the auto save actions, making the compiler error again. Using @format:on/off didn't help. 🙁
timeline.author: wborn

timeline.message:
Add and fix more null annotations

Signed-off-by: Wouter Born <github@maindrain.net>

Add and fix more null annotations

timeline.author: cweitkamp
